title: Apartments for sale next to MountLavinia Hotel
details:
Brand new Apartments 3 bedroomed ,2 Bathroom with Maids Room and washroom available at Lillian Avenue , Mount Lavinia adjoining the Mount Lavinia Hotel.

Please note that this a project constructed by Blue Ocean Group and it has been structurally fully completed reaching the finishing stage ,the last 3 Units are available for sale where as we are looking forward to complete the project in a matter of months where as interest free payment plans and Bank Loans could be arranged If required.

Feel free enough to contact me anytime for further details and arrangements could be made to view a model apartment and the site.
